pages.text: The Flame Flower is a vibrant bloom with ember-like petals that radiate a gentle warmth. These remarkable plants are completely fire-resistant and thrive in higher temperatures.

Cultivation Notes:$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil$(br)- Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom$(br)- Growth is accelerated in warmer environments$(br)- When fully bloomed, provides Fire Resistance to entities that step on it

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Flame Flower Seeds must be planted on Grove Soil. Their growth can be accelerated by placing heat sources nearby such as lava or fire (safely contained, of course).

pages.title: Bloom
pages.text: When harvested, the Flame Flower Bloom continues to emit a faint warmth. It is used to create Flame Spell Essence and serves as a component in various heat-resistant magical items.
